title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations                         Loggerhead Sea Turtle Nesting at Fort Pickens Loggerhead sea turtle nested at 5:30 on Fort Pickens beach, June 17, 2012  Duration:4 minutes, 14 seconds                                Mississippi Coastal Ceanup Keeping our Beaches and Bayous Clean  Duration:1 minute, 40 seconds                                   Life as a Lifeguard Six professional lifeguards at Gulf Islands National Seashore describe their work, and why they find it rewarding. (Running Time 07:45)  Duration:7 minutes, 45 seconds                                Responding to the Deepwater Horizon Oil Spill Experience the sights and sounds of the aftermath of the Deepwater Horizon Oil Spill on the beaches of Gulf Islands National Seashore during the summer of 2010. (Running Time: 03:25)   Duration:3 minutes, 25 seconds                                Helping Sea Turtles Through an Oil Spill In the aftermath of the Deepwater Horizon Oil Spill in the summer of 2010, more than 700 sea turtle nests along the gulf coast are being carefully excavated and relocated across the Florida peninsula to be hatched and released in the Atlantic. Watch and listen as biologists at Gulf Islands National Seashore describe and demonstrate their participation in this massive environmental undertaking.  Duration:3 minutes, 37 seconds                                Fire In The Parks Prescribed Fire in Parks  Duration:10 minutes, 59 seconds
